metadata.title: CVE-2024-8385 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A difference in the handling of StructFields and ArrayTypes in WASM couldbe used to trigger an exploitable type confusion vulnerability. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 130, Firefox ESR < 128.2, and Thunderbird <128.2.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
